p: Serotype assignments for VP1 and VP4/VP2 sequences were performed using an automated phylogenetic-based enterovirus typing tool developed by Kroneman et al., [ 23] available at http://www.rivm.nl/mpf/enterovirus/typingtool/. Because the automated typing tool can determine VP4/VP2 sequences at species level only [ 23], further serotype determination for VP4/VP2 sequences was based on highest nucleotide identity score (HNIS) and highest amino acid sequence similarity (HAASS) with reference prototypes [ 24, 25]. In case of discrepancy, final assignment was based on HAASS and further confirmed using BLAST [ 21, 26].
